document_data.name: Battleaxe
document_data.mainbody: '''Battleaxes''' were a martial melee weapon in the [[axe]] family.
document_data.Description: Battleaxe were a simple axe head mounted on a wooden or metal haft about {{SIrange|2.5|3|ft|long=yes}} long. They could be ornate or plain, with blades either slightly curved or rounded. Some battleaxes were known to have a short spike or blade on the back of their axeheads, as well as a spike on the end of their shafts. Some came with belt hooks on the side of their heads.

Notable Users of Battleaxes.Races & Sentient Creatures: * [[Dwarves]] often favored the use of battleaxes in close-quarter combat.
Notable Users of Battleaxes.Regions, Nations, & Settlements: * Battleaxes were a commonly used weapon among inhabitants of [[Malatra]].{{Cite polyhedron/102/Heroes of Malatra|14}}
Notable Users of Battleaxes.Religions:
* Battleaxes were known to be considered favored weapons of the gods [[Callarduran]] and [[Maglubiyet]].
* The [[Dancing Dwarves]], a religious organization in [[Zakhara]] dedicated to the deity [[Kor]], had a battleaxe as their symbol and their favored weapon.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|29}}
